projects about

BeBetter


BeBetter was a project for LA Hacks, a 36 hour hackathon. Our team wanted to make something that was both useful and fun, so we came upon the idea of combining two seemingly contradictory ideas: gambling and productivity.

Check out the following links to see more: GitHub Repo | Devpost

I primarily worked on the frontend, designing and developing the layout, button functionality, and implementing a few of the connections to the backend. Below are some examples of the functionality of our website.

task creation and completion functionality
betting on friends' tasks
adding and accepting friends display
I also configured a dark mode for accessibility

We originally deployed our site live at bebetter.study, but couldn't afford to keep it up and running. However, you can still check out a videoed example of our site with a full explanation of our tech stack and features on our Devpost, or check out our code through our github repository,

with by Joanna Liu
